about_the_game:
Philosopher's Stone game is a 1Vs.1 turn-based online strategy game, consisting of more than 16 different characters, robots, monsters, zombies, animals, vehicles, and humans of all ages, colors, and races. And there is Philosopher's Stone that was In ancient Egypt, it was discovered by an Arab alchemist. Each of these characters has a different story. They came together in one game.

These characters are different in movement, attack power, health, special abilities, movement range, attack range and special ability range, and they are also different in battery consuming for movement, attack, and abilities. So you have to choose your team of characters depending on your playing strategy. You must protect your Philosopher's Stone and destroy the opposing team's Philosopher's Stone to win the game.

The Philosopher's Stone is a legendary substance discovered by an Arab alchemist extracts from it elixir of life that gives eternal life. It is located in ancient Egypt,
You have to protect it to survive and destroy the opponent team's Philosopher's Stone to win the game.

For More Detail Visit Our Website

name: Philosopher's Stone

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3210
  • Memory: 300 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or NVIDIA GeForce
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: On Board
  • VR Support: No
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3330
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX970 or AMD Radeon
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: On Board
  • VR Support: No
